name: OrbitCarrot CTA Widget Manager
author: OrbitCarrot

sections.description:
CTA Widget Manager allows you to very easily create Call To Actions for your WordPress sites as widgets, simply choose the text, the style and where you want the CTA to link to – it’s that simple!

CTA Widget Manager is a free version of our low cost premium widget ‘CTA Manager’ – CTA Manager also allows you to create Call to Actions as widgets but has more functionality including creating in-content CTAs with an awesome CTA shortcode generator check our CTA Manager here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ctawidgetmanager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
*Can I create my own call to action designs?,
*The simple answer is Yes, choose the un-styled option and then either style with CSS or just replace the un-styled blank image with your own.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload ctawidgetmanager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: The easiest way to create Call to Actions as widgets on your Wordpress site. Customize your own CTA style or use pre-designed ones.
